title: 詠春係唯一單手可以打贏嘅武功

replies.msg:
俾人單手打贏

https://youtu.be/vm-8jBN4V0M

詠春在真打來說冇乜用。My Joe is a kickboxing fan. Channel one gives live coverage of kickboxing fights. John's fight against Alexander received widespread press coverage. His fight against Dan also got detailed media coverage. He tends to get lots of newspaper and magazine coverage because his fights are exciting to watch. Tomorrow, the organization is going to hold a chairmanship election. Channel one will be giving the election in-depth coverage. If you wanna check out the reports of John's previous fights, their monthly magazines have extensive coverage of them. The book "Martial Arts Techniques" provides good grappling technique coverage. Japan Mobile now has nationwide coverage with its network which easily outshines other service providers. Their network coverage used to be poor in Osaka which affected how people could access the internet but nowadays, it's regarded as one of the best. Their coverage is fantastic throughout the country. Joe is a bassoonist. He's looking at a few insurance plans and choosing one which provides the most adequate life, health and medical insurance coverage. He's thinking of paying an extra premium to have insurance cover for accidental damage to his bassoon as well as increasing the cover up to one million yen.
單手打兼單手擋
